AddressEmptyCode(address).details: There's no code at `target` (it is not a contract).

ERC1967InvalidImplementation(address).details: The `implementation` of the proxy is invalid.

ERC1967NonPayable().details: An upgrade function sees `msg.value > 0` that may be lost.

FailedInnerCall().details: A call to an address target failed. The target may have reverted.

FlashLoan__AmountBeyondMax().details: Thrown when the loan amount exceeds the maximum allowed.

FlashLoan__AmountBeyondMin().details: Thrown when the loan amount is below the minimum allowed.

FlashLoan__CollateralIsNotActive().details: Thrown when the collateral required for the loan is not active.

FlashLoan__LoanIsNotRepayable().details: Thrown when the flash loan cannot be repaid.

FlashLoan__SetupIsInitialized().details: Thrown when attempting to setup an already initialized flash loan.

FlashLoan__ZeroAddresses().details: Thrown when one or more provided addresses are zero addresses.

OwnableInvalidOwner(address).details: The owner is not a valid owner account. (eg. `address(0)`)

OwnableUnauthorizedAccount(address).details: The caller account is not authorized to perform an operation.

UUPSUnauthorizedCallContext().details: The call is from an unauthorized context.

UUPSUnsupportedProxiableUUID(bytes32).details: The storage `slot` is unsupported as a UUID.

params._stableCoin: The address of the stable coin contract.
params._swapRouter: The address of the swap router contract.

params._debtAmount: The amount of debt incurred by the borrower.
params._feeAmount: The fee amount for the flash loan.

Initialized(uint64).details: Triggered when the contract has been initialized or reinitialized.

Upgraded(address).details: Emitted when the implementation is upgraded.

flashLoan(uint256).details: This function initiates a flash loan transaction where the specified amount is borrowed and must be repaid along with a fee within the same transaction

params._amount: The amount of the flash loan.

flashLoanForRepay(address).details: This function initiates a flash loan transaction to repay a debt on the specified asset.

params._asset: The address of the asset for which the debt is to be repaid.

initialize(address).details: Sets an intiial owner for the contract.

owner().details: Returns the address of the current owner.

proxiableUUID().details: Implementation of the ERC1822 {proxiableUUID} function. This returns the storage slot used by the implementation. It is used to validate the implementation's compatibility when performing an upgrade. IMPORTANT: A proxy pointing at a proxiable contract should not be considered proxiable itself, because this risks bricking a proxy that upgrades to it, by delegating to itself until out of gas. Thus it is critical that this function revert if invoked through a proxy. This is guaranteed by the `notDelegated` modifier.

renounceOwnership().details: Leaves the contract without owner. It will not be possible to call `onlyOwner` functions. Can only be called by the current owner. NOTE: Renouncing ownership will leave the contract without an owner, thereby disabling any functionality that is only available to the owner.

params._stableCoin: The address of Stable Coin contract.
params._swapRouter: The address of Swap Router contract.

transferOwnership(address).details: Transfers ownership of the contract to a new account (`newOwner`). Can only be called by the current owner.

upgradeToAndCall(address,bytes).details: Upgrade the implementation of the proxy to `newImplementation`, and subsequently execute the function call encoded in `data`. Calls {_authorizeUpgrade}. Emits an {Upgraded} event.

AddressesSet(address,address).notice: Emitted when the addresses for stableCoin and swapRouter are set.

FlashLoanExecuted(address,uint256,uint25.notice: Emitted when a flash loan is executed.

FEE_DENOMINATOR().notice: The denominator to calculate fee percentage.

flashLoan(uint256).notice: Executes a flash loan for the specified amount.

flashLoanForRepay(address).notice: Executes a flash loan specifically to repay a debt on the provided asset.

getFlashLoanRate().notice: Gets the current flash loan rate.

isSetupInitialized().notice: The index that setup is initialized or not.

setInternalAddresses(address,address).notice: Sets addresses for stableCoin and swapRouter contracts.

stableCoin().notice: The address of Stable Coin contract.

swapRouter().notice: The address of Swap Router contract.

userdoc.notice: This contract provides functionality for executing flash loans.
